catalogId.description: The catalog ID where the table resides.

databaseName.description: Name of the metadata database where the table metadata resides. For Hive compatibility, this must be all lowercase.

partitionIndex.description: Configuration block for a partition index. See `partition_index` below.

tableName.description: Name of the table. For Hive compatibility, this must be entirely lowercase.
